results.description: La Conmebol decidió trasladar a Lima la final de la Copa Libertadores por la ola de protestas que vive Chile.
results.shortTitle: La final de la Copa Libertadores se traslada a Lima por las protestas en Chile
results.title: Copa Libertadores: las protestas en Chile obligan a trasladar a Lima la final entre River Plate y Flamengo

results.description: Flamengo reach their first Copa Libertadores final in 35 years after thrashing fellow Brazilian side Gremio 5-0 in their semi-final second leg.
results.shortTitle: Flamengo beat Gremio to reach final
results.title: Copa Libertadores: Flamengo beat Gremio and face River Plate in final

thumbnail.altText: Flamengo players celebrate at the final whistle after beating Gremio to reach the Copa Libertadores final

results.description: Defending champions River Plate reach the Copa Libertadores final with a 2-1 win on aggregate in the semi-final against city rivals Boca Juniors.
results.shortTitle: River Plate lose to Boca but reach final
results.title: Copa Libertadores: River Plate lose to Boca Juniors but reach final

thumbnail.altText: River Plate players celebrate reaching the final

results.description: Police arrest 16 Flamengo fans for "threats to kill police" before the Copa Libertadores semi-final second leg against Gremio in Brazil.
results.shortTitle: Flamengo fans arrested before semi
results.title: Copa Libertadores: Flamengo fans arrested before Gremio semi-final

results.description: Argentine rivals River Plate and Boca Juniors will meet in Wednesday's Copa Libertadores semi-final, nine months after their controversial 2018 final.
results.shortTitle: Rivals meet again in Copa Libertadores
results.title: Copa Libertadores: Boca Juniors & River Plate to do battle again

results.description: A River Plate fan made sure he could access his side's goals against Boca Juniors in the Copa Libertadores final by having a QR code inked on his leg.
results.shortTitle: River Plate fan tattoos link to Copa Libertadores highlights on his leg
results.title: River Plate fan gets QR code tattoo linking to Copa Libertadores final highlights

thumbnail.altText: River Plate fans celebrate their win against Boca Juniors

results.description: A "fudged final", a sign of things to come, or both? BBC Sport's Manu Djazmi assesses whether staging South America's biggest game in Europe was a success.
results.shortTitle: Did holding Superclasico in Madrid work?
results.title: Copa Libertadores final: Did staging River Plate v Boca Juniors in Madrid work?

thumbnail.altText: River Plate fans celebrate in the stands

results.description: Watch highlights as River Plate beat Boca Juniors 3-1 to claim their fourth Copa Libertadores trophy in front of 72,000 fans at Real Madrid's Bernabeu stadium.
results.shortTitle: River Plate beat Boca Juniors to win Copa Libertadores
results.title: River Plate beat Boca Juniors 3-1 to win the Copa Libertadores final

results.description: River Plate face Boca Juniors in the second leg of the Copa Libertadores final at the Santiago Bernabeu in Madrid - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Copa Libertadores: River Plate out-last Boca in marathon final
results.title: River Plate v Boca Juniors live in the Copa Libertadores final second leg

thumbnail.altText: Enzo Perez and Pablo Perez battle for the ball

results.description: Boca Juniors have a late attempt to postpone Sunday's Copa Libertadores final second leg rejected by the Court of Arbitration for Sport.
results.shortTitle: Boca bid to postpone Copa final rejected
results.title: Copa Libertadores final: Boca Juniors' bid to postpone match rejected by Cas

results.description: Boca Juniors forward Carlos Tevez says the Copa Libertadores attack on his team's bus by River Plate fans "took away players' dreams".
results.shortTitle: Madrid final 'embarrassing' - Tevez
results.title: Copa Libertadores final: Boca Juniors v River Plate in Madrid 'embarrassing'

results.description: River Plate coach Marcelo Gallardo says moving the Copa Libertadores final from Argentina to Madrid is "robbing the fans" and a "total disgrace".
results.shortTitle: Madrid switch is 'robbing the fans'
results.title: Copa Libertadores final switch to Madrid is 'robbing fans' - Marcelo Gallardo

results.description: Argentine side River Plate object to playing the postponed second leg of their Copa Libertadores final against Boca Juniors in Madrid.
results.shortTitle: River Plate oppose Madrid final switch
results.title: River Plate oppose playing Copa Libertadores final in Madrid

results.description: The second leg of the Copa Libertadores final between Boca Juniors and River Plate is moved 6,000 miles away to Madrid's Bernabeu.
results.shortTitle: Copa Libertadores moved to Madrid
results.title: Copa Libertadores: River Plate v Boca Juniors moved to Bernabeu in Madrid

results.description: The postponed Copa Libertadores final second leg between River Plate and Boca Juniors will take place on 8 or 9 December but will not be held in Argentina.
results.shortTitle: Copa Libertadores final date announced
results.title: River Plate v Boca Juniors: Postponed Copa Libertadores final second leg will not be held in Argentina

results.description: River Plate hooligans are blamed for an attack on the Boca Juniors bus before the Copa Libertadores final second leg.
results.shortTitle: River Plate 'mafia' blamed for attack
results.title: Copa Libertadores: River Plate 'mafia' blamed for Boca Juniors bus attack

results.description: It was to be the biggest match in the world - but after River Plate fans attacked the Boca Juniors bus, the postponed Copa Libertadores final has shamed Argentina, writes Mani Djazmi.
results.shortTitle: The 36 hours that shamed Argentine football
results.title: Copa Libertadores: The 36 hours that shamed Argentine football

thumbnail.altText: A River Plate fan sets a Boca Juniors shirt alight

results.description: Sunday's Copa Libertadores final second leg between Boca Juniors and River Plate, rescheduled after violence on Saturday, is postponed.
results.shortTitle: Copa Libertadores final postponed again
results.title: Copa Libertadores: Boca Juniors against River Plate match postponed again

thumbnail.altText: Police outside the River Plate stadium

results.description: The second leg of the Copa Libertadores final is postponed for 24 hours until Sunday after River Plate fans attack the Boca Juniors team bus.
results.shortTitle: Copa final postponed after bus attack
results.title: River Plate v Boca Juniors Copa Libertadores final postponed after bus attack

thumbnail.altText: The Boca Juniors team bus ahead of the Copa Libertadores final second leg.

results.description: Clashes between Boca Juniors and River Plate have injured players and delayed the Copa Libertadores final.
results.shortTitle: Football final postponed after team bus attack
results.title: Boca Juniors v River Plate final in Copa Libertadores postponed after team bus attacked.
